name: Candent Technologies, Inc.
overview: Candent Technologies has all of the tools to design virtually any gas turbine engine component up to and including complete engines, and can perform design and analysis as required on an expedited basis. This team of highly experienced problem solvers” finds innovative solutions to difficult customer problems on a regular basis. Candent Technologies is currently developing advanced engine technology for the U.S. Army and is under contract to demonstrate this ground breaking technology in a full scale engine test program.
